mapper.select: select id,title, logo from blog where id = #{id }

select a.no as no, a.name as name, a.description as description, a.reg_date as regDate, a.id as id, ifnull(count(b.no),0) as countPost from category as a left outer join post as b on a.no = b.category_no where a.id=#{id} group by a.no order by a.reg_date desc
select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post as a, user as b where b.id = #{id} order by a.reg_date desc limit 1

select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post as a, category as b where a.category_no = b.no and b.id = #{id} order by a.reg_date desc limit 0,5

select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post as a, user as b where b.id = #{id} and a.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by a.reg_date desc limit 1

select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post as a, user as b where b.id = #{id} and a.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by a.reg_date desc limit 0,5

select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post as a, user as b where b.id = #{id} and a.no = #{postNo} and a.category_no = #{categoryNo} order by a.reg_date desc limit 1
